words.name: audible
words.explain: aud+ible, ible=able 有....能力.听得见的

words.name: audio
words.definition: adj. 声音的；[声] 音频的
words.explain: audi=aud  +o, 元音aeiou变换，其意义不变

words.name: auditory
words.definition: n. 听众；礼堂    adj. 听觉的；耳朵的
words.explain: aud + itory  -itory 当作为名词后缀时，表示：场所，地点，作形容词后缀。表示：有...性质的

words.name: audience
words.definition: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见
words.explain: audi+ence  -ence 名词后缀

words.name: audit
words.definition: n. 审计；[审计] 查帐    vt. （美）旁听
words.explain: audit  最初官方的查账都是听人报账

words.name: auditorium
words.explain: audit + orium -orium 表地点场所的名词后缀

words.name: sonic
words.definition: son + ic -ic 形容词和名词后缀：.....的
words.explain: adj. 音速的；声音的；音波的

words.name: resonance
words.explain: re- + son + -ance, re- 往回，重复的。 -ance 名词后缀

words.name: sing
words.pronunciation: vi. 唱歌；歌颂；鸣叫；呼号

words.name: song
words.definition: vi. 唱歌；歌颂；鸣叫；呼号
words.explain: sing 来自 sing 的名词形式 元音aeiou变换，其意义不变

words.name: chant
words.definition: n. 圣歌；赞美诗  vt. 唱；诵扬

words.name: enchant
words.explain: en- 进入 chant 唱歌，念咒

words.name: accent
words.explain: ac-,去，往，-cent,唱，词源同 chant,吟唱。字面意思即说话像唱歌，后指口音。

words.name: vocal
words.definition: adj. 歌唱的；声音的，有声的
words.explain: voc + -al

words.name: voice
words.definition: n. 声音；嗓音；发言权；愿望
words.explain: voice = voc

words.name: vocabulary
words.explain: voc + -able + -ary

words.name: vocation
words.definition: n. 职业；天职；天命；神召
words.explain: voc + -ation 原先指上帝的呼唤，神职，牧师类的工作，现泛指所有职业

words.name: invoke
words.explain: in-,进入，使，-vok,说，祈求，词源同 voice,evoke.即召唤神灵，祈求神灵，引申词义援引， 提及

words.name: predict
words.explain: pre-,在前，早于，预先，-dict,说

words.name: addict

words.name: contradict
words.explain: contra-,相对， 相反， -dict,说

words.name: verdict
words.explain: ver-,真实的， 词源同 verify,-dict,说， 词源同 dictionary.引申词义公正， 裁决。

words.name: diction
words.explain: dict-,说，命令 -ion 名词后缀

words.name: eloquent
words.explain: e-,向外，-loq,说

words.name: loquacious
words.explain: loqu + -acious

words.name: monologue
words.explain: mono-,单个的，-logue,对话

words.name: apology
words.explain: apo-,离开，远离，相对，-log,说，词源同 lecture.原义指自辩，辩解，后指道歉(道歉本质 上也是一种辩解)。

words.name: dialogue
words.explain: dia-,穿过，-log,说.即人与人之间的对话，交流。

words.name: catalog
words.explain: cata-,向下，-log,说，读，

words.name: analogy
words.explain: ana-,向上，向后，-log,说话，思考

words.name: epilogue

words.name: profess
words.explain: pro-,向前，在前，-fess,说话，告知

words.name: professor
words.explain: 来自 profess,宣称，信奉，-er,人。字面意思指公开宣称自己在某领域是行家的人

words.name: profession
words.explain: 来自 profess,宣称，信奉，-ion,名词后缀。引申词义职业，行业，即内心的召唤。词义演变 比较 vocation,voice.

words.explain: con-,表强调，-fess,说，交谈

words.explain: ad-,去，往，-opt,选择，词源同 option.

etymology.explain: 跑。 curry 库里，nba跑得快

words.explain: bi-,二，-ped,脚，

words.name: impede
words.explain: im-,进入，使，-ped,脚，词源同 foot,biped.引申词义限制脚的行动，锁上脚链，阻碍。

words.name: expedition
words.explain: ex-,向外，-ped,脚，脚镣，词源同 foot,impede.即解脱脚镣的束缚，加快速度，或来自比喻义， 解脱脚的束缚，飞起来。

words.name: centipede
words.explain: cent-,百，百分之一，-ped,脚，

words.name: station

words.explain: 来自拉丁语 stare,站立，来自 PIE*sta,站立，使固定，词源同 stand,state.-ation,名词后缀。引 申诸相关词义。

words.name: subsidy

words.name: parasite

words.name: obsess

words.name: affect
words.explain: af-,去，往，-fect,做，词源同 fact.该词衍生出两个截然相反的词义:1.做出来的样子，假装， 2.真心实意的做，打动，影响。

words.name: perfect

words.name: abstract

words.name: trace

words.name: reject

words.name: inject

words.name: abject
words.explain: ab-,离开，-ject,扔，词源同 project.即扔掉的，引申词义悲惨的。

words.name: object

words.name: trajectory
words.explain: tra-,转移，穿过，-ject,扔，投射，词源同 project,jet.引申词义轨迹，踪迹，弹道等。

words.name: accept

words.name: mentor
